author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: Pakistan Engages Michael Saylor in Bold Push Toward Bitcoin-Backed Economy
description: High-level talks highlight Pakistan’s ambitions to lead digital asset adoption in the Global South and position Bitcoin as a tool for economic resilience.
content:
Pakistan has taken a significant leap toward integrating digital assets into its economic roadmap by hosting bitcoin
